name: .NET Foundation
description: The .NET Foundation is an independent, non-profit organization established to support the .NET open source ecosystem and foster open development.

name: Medeco Security Locks
description: Medeco Security Locks, based in Salem, VA, is a leader in high security locking systems, providing advanced protection for facilities worldwide.

name: Ozmo
description: Ozmo provides digital support solutions that solve customer problems across all digital channels, helping organizations enhance customer satisfaction and operational efficiency.

name: Docker
description: Docker is a platform designed to help developers build, share, and run container applications, streamlining the development process and application deployment.
